resources.string: Do you have proof of identity? Examples include: citizenship/residency cards, permits, and passports
Do you have proof of address? Examples include: lease, letter from landlord, rent receipt, and any government id
Do you have proof of income or lack thereof? Examples include: Any wages, salaries, government benefits and letters proving income
Do you pay for child or elderly care services? provide a written statement or receipts for services rendered
Do you have previous health coverage? provide all paperwork, if applicable
If you are currently pregnant, do you have proof of pregnancy?
If you are not a U.S Citizen, do you have immigration papers? Examples include Green Card, Visa, Passport, DACA
